fullText: Under Maria Friedman's assured direction, this production of 'Merrily We Roll Along' is a triumphant revival that finally gives Sondheim and Furth's complex musical the Broadway treatment it has long deserved.
dtliExcerpt: Under Maria Friedman's assured direction, this production of 'Merrily We Roll Along' is a triumphant revival that finally gives Sondheim and Furth's complex musical the Broadway treatment it has long deserved.
